name: Chaos Room
description:
Chaos Room is an intense and realistic game about programming, taking place minutes before deadline. Type as fast as you can and don't let the garbage clutter your room to get the highest score.

This game was created for Ludum Dare 37.

Music by Thomas Collins. (thomascollinsmusic@gmail.com)

Also, check out my other games or support me on Patreon. I would really appreciate if you did any of those things.
